title: If the Villainess’s Younger Sister Really Liked It - Novel Updates
tags: Broken Engagement   Caring Protagonist   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Phobias   Short Story   Siblings   Sibling's Care   Villainess Noble Girls   Younger Sisters
author: Mint   ミント
description:
Saria, a villainess, is told by her fiancé, Neil, a handsome young man with a handsome face, that he is breaking off their engagement because she is torturing her stepsister. 

Saria’s younger sister Helen is an aristocratic young woman, but she is always cleaning and her hands are rough, which is what she really wants.>
